ModMetaData.name: More Max Memes
ModMetaData.author: kenx00x
ModMetaData.description: With this mod you can have way more memes with ideology (0-100 memes by default). You can change the minimum memes and the maximum memes in the mod settings options. You can also change how many memes NPC factions have (1-3 memes by default). You can also change the maximum amount of venerated animals (18 venerated animals by default).
